select.placeholder: What do you want to know?

project.argP1: Complete redesign of the vote capture and monitoring application in React.
project.argP2: *Resolved over 100 issues* to update old software to the new version.
project.argP3: Implementation of new features in *highly complex code.*
project.argP4: Creation of a user management application using Next 13 (Api routes, server components), *reducing a 4-hour process to 30 minutes*
project.esP1: *Development in multiple applications simultaneously* to provide support where needed, while maintaining a primary role in the vote dissemination application.
project.esP2: Creation of a *multilingual website* with React to download electoral press data.
project.esP3: *Implementation of responsive design* with animations using Tailwind, framer motion, eCharts, Radix...
project.ustP1: Created the application from scratch with *Angular and Firebase.*
project.ustP3: Focused on features and connection with firestore DB.

dreamJobSection.title: What's my dream job like?
dreamJobSection.subtitle: Choose the options to see how balanced your offer is

explanations.workModel: Hybrid maximum 2 days in Madrid or 100% remote.
explanations.overtime: I'm only willing to do overtime if it's well controlled and done sporadically.
explanations.flexible: Possibility to start working within a range of hours, instead of at a specific time. I work best if I wake up from 08:00 AM.
explanations.salaryReview: There must be a date (at least annually) and real possibilities of a salary increase if I deserve it.
explanations.coWorkers: Sociable colleagues and a good overall environment.
explanations.codeReviews: Constructive criticism of my code to improve as a programmer, as well as to ensure the quality of the project's code.
explanations.communication: Sufficient communication to keep me informed of everything I need to know.
explanations.moreFrameworks: Using different frameworks or participating in different projects over time.
explanations.testing: Being able to do testing on projects. I'm very interested in learning more.
explanations.backend: Possibility to work as a fullstack developer.
explanations.topSalary: Very high salary, dreaming is free.
explanations.dailyIntensive: 7-hour workday each day, 35 hours per week.
explanations.youngTeam: Part of the team consisting of people aged 20-30.
explanations.bonus: Annual bonus for personal or company objectives.
explanations.training: Training for certifications and training platforms.
explanations.freedom: Being able to choose the technologies to be used in each project without major restrictions.

CTA1Section.title: As job offers often say:
CTA1Section.1: You don't have to meet all the requirements.
CTA1Section.2: If you think you have a good offer...

FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.Q1: Are you authorized to work in the European Union?
FAQSection.A2: It depends on the job and the responsibilities it entails. We'll have to discuss it in the interview.
FAQSection.Q3: What other languages do you know?
FAQSection.A3: The important ones are Java andPython
FAQSection.Q4: When was this page last updated?
FAQSection.A4: March 2023. Although data such as experience and age are automatically updated.
FAQSection.A5: It's possible if your project is compatible with a full-time job.
